resources.string: The network is not working, please try again later
Your account is logged in somewhere else. Please change your password if you are not the user
Required permissions are denied, please turn on Settings to enable the appropriate permissions
The permission is denied and needs to be set to use this function normally
Please allow the application to obtain the following permissions for a better user experience:\nGet device ID and location for push\nCache some information to SD card
Please allow the application to obtain the following permissions for a better user experience:\nCache some information to SD card
Please allow the application to obtain the following permissions for a better user experience:\nMicrophone use
Please allow the application to obtain the following permissions for a better user experience:\nAccess photos and cameras on your storage device
Please allow the application to obtain the following permissions for a better user experience:\nCamera use
Please allow the application to obtain the following permissions for a better user experience:\nAccess video on your storage device
